Buttons

Buttons design

Flat style

This is default button style.

<vue-goodshare-facebook></vue-goodshare-facebook>

Gradient style

<vue-goodshare-facebook 
  button_design="gradient"
></vue-goodshare-facebook>

Outline style

<vue-goodshare-facebook 
  button_design="outline"
></vue-goodshare-facebook>

With square edges

<vue-goodshare-facebook 
  has_square_edges
></vue-goodshare-facebook>

With counter

<vue-goodshare-facebook 
  has_counter
></vue-goodshare-facebook>
